data.name: thread_pool_min_threads
data.type: minimum number of threads in the thread pool. in bursty environments, after a period of inactivity, threads would normally be retired. when the next burst arrives, it would take time to reach the optimal level. setting this value higher than the default would prevent thread retirement even if inactive. windows-only. use
